txt.en: Now that you have thinned the lynx-population, Nos has asked you to deal with the wolves to the north-east.

'Now that you've dealt with the lynx, we will need to thin the wolf population some to make sure that balance is preserved.\n\n'Head to the north-east and hunt down some Frost-wolves. The evil creatures are no doubt spies of goblins.'
Wolves can be found by the frozen lake, north-east of Frerin's Court.\n\nNos Grimsong has asked you to thin the number of wolves in the region.
'Well done, [placeholder]. Through your efforts our home will be better for the future.\n\n'Please take this along with my thanks as your reward.'
Nos Grimsong is in the north-west corner of Frerin's Court.\n\nYou should return to Nos Grimsong for your reward.
'Head to the north-east and hunt down some Frost-wolves. The evil creatures are no doubt spies of goblins.'
'Perhaps now that there are fewer lynx about, the balance of nature will be restored to these lands.'
Talk to Nos Grimsong in Frerin's Court
